tasks.label: Run smoke tests
args: "const { execSync } = require('node:child_process'); const fs=require('fs'); const path='test'; const files=fs.readdirSync(path).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.js')); for (const f of files){ console.log('>>>', f); try{ execSync(`node ${path}/${f}`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch(e){ process.exit(1);} }"
